headline: Aon Highlights Regional Hires As Investors Weigh Mixed Share Performance
summary: Aon subsidiary NFP appointed Jack Spencer as Senior Vice President of Commercial Risk in the Northeast. Aon named Neelay Patel as CEO for Malaysia, expanding leadership in the Asia Pacific region. These appointments land at an interesting time for Aon (NYSE:AON), with the share price at $333.0 and a mixed return profile. The stock is up 6.6% over three years and 68.4% over five years, while the one-year return shows an 8.5% decline and year-to-date performance is down 3.3%. That backdrop...
